name: Stick Survivor 2D
description:
Play as a lone Stick(man) in a world where black, red and purple squares tries to kill you, and, green, yellow and blue squares heals you. To survive use strategy and reflexes to increase your score/high score.

Controls

A/D or left/right arrows; move left and right

Spacebar: Jump

Right Click: Place selected object

Middle Mouse Button: toggle fast build

Ctrl + R: Resets high score
